title: Disposal, Courtyard, Full Stainless Appliance Package
posting_body: This beautiful pet-friendly apartment community has everything you are looking for including a recreation room, fitness room, two sparkling pools two jacuzzi’s, three elevators, onsite laundry, assigned parking, and controlled access entry.
Unit amenities include air conditioner, ceiling fan, stove, dishwasher, full kitchen, spacious closet, full bath, and a private patio!
Perigee Apartments are located near Lanark Park, Canoga Park Library, Vons Market Target and Limerick Avenue School.
Contact us today and let our friendly and professional leasing team help you find your new dream home at Perigee Apartments in Canoga Park!
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
